name: PUROGAMI PATRAKAR SANGH
briefDescription: Purogami Patrkar Sangh Registerd in Fifth May2017 Raigad.Under Maharashtra Society Act  1860 sangh's Registered No.is MAH/213/2017/RAIGAD,Then This Sangh also registered in 21 August 2017under Public Trust's Act 1950.Mr-Vijaykumar R.Suryawanshi is a Founder and President. Our Multipurpose Aims and Objects in various Sectot.Main Aims and Objects is Patrakarita in Social Media,To develope peoples Knowledge in Society ,in our Natio.we also work in Education,Health for All,Socially,Agriculture,Cultural,Meditation.Sports and Spirutals Activity,we implement Various Programme like as Environment and Science,To save Earth,Water and Trees,Income Generation Activity and personal Developement Activity as well as we held Journalist workshop. we trying to Change Peoples Knowledge Attitude and Their Practices by convinance Through Write Article in Different News Paper.
